name: Orb of Disaster, Ifrit Glass
text: When this card enters your field, remove the top card of your main deck from the game. , banish this card: Put a non-regalia card from your removed area into your hand. If your J/ruler is "The Observer" or "Timeline Arsonist, Alisaris", put up to two non-regalia cards from your removed area into your hand instead. (Reveal any face down card before putting it from your removed area into your hand this way.)
